features: 【DURABLE MATERIAL】:Orthopedic knee pillow with memory foam, ergonomically cut shape to provide you with more comfortable support without deformation. The pillowcase of the knee pillow is made of high-quality, breathable and soft double-layer polyurethane fabric, which can keep the legacy leg pillow dry and hygienic for a long time.

【HELP SLEEP】: Orthopedic knee pillow can help you relieve the discomfort of back, buttocks, legs, knees and sciatica. The contour design of the pillow pad perfectly fits the human body curve, allowing your legs to maintain a natural posture during sleep. And make you refreshed the next day.

【BETTER SLEEP FOR ANYONE】: You can place the knee wedge pillow wherever you need it, such as thighs, calves, knees or even neck. Leg pillow for sleeping have become a good companion for people who lack sleep, and are warmly welcomed by pregnant women and side sleepers.

【WASHABLE PILLOWCASE】: Our knee pillow for side sleepers has a white pillowcase made of velvet woven cloth, which is friendly to your skin. The orthopedic knee pillow has a hidden zipper that allows you to remove and clean the pillowcase. Note: Memory foam knee pillow cannot be cleaned.

【WIDE RANGE OF APPLICATIONS】: Knee pillows for back pain can be used not only in beds, sofas, offices, recliners, airplanes or long-distance trips, but also as gifts for your loved ones. This home knee pillow is widely used when people sleep, read books or watch TV.

Why use adjustable knee pillow? Knee joint: pain caused by fatigue and injury Sciatica: Pain that travels along the path of the sciatic nerve and pain after injury Back and buttocks: pain after sitting for a long time, twisted spine or injury Pregnancy: The pain caused by strain is on the joints of your lower back and pelvis.

The perfect balance between support and comfort Orthopedic support pillow sounds hard and uncomfortable? But on the contrary! When you're tired at night, there's nothing better for your legs than lying on a soft, cuddly pillow. Innovative Knee Cuts Relieve Joint Pain Going up stairs, down stairs, rushing to the subway, sitting hunched over for hours, jogging at night: your knees do a lot of work all day long! Treat yourself to a well-deserved relaxing break in the evening Premium Memory Foam Filled with 45D slow rebound memory foam, fully certified by OEKO-TEX for durability, this high elasticity memory foam could support body part to relief pain and will not flatten for long time use. Flame retardant filling ensures maximum security.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicer than the old model
reviews.reviewText: I love this pillow because it stays between my legs. It brings relief to my hips and knees. The ergonomic design is perfect and the foam is sturdy. This pillow is very well made, good quality. I will recommend this pillow to sleep in a better position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best pillow I’ve had to put between my knees to sleep. My husband bought me one last year and I liked it but it was just to bulky and I have to be cool when I sleep. You can put this between your knees or legs and lay in any position and it works. I had a knee replacement and I can’t stand the feeling of my knees on top of the other because I sleep sideways. Easy to wash and it’s very sturdy but soft. I don’t put mine in the dryer but you can. Love it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I found it a little small for my size
reviews.reviewText: I think the pillow was made for a child or a small lady

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft yet firm
reviews.reviewText: I use it but not really thrilled with it. There were no pictures to show best way to use it the shape if im using it rt. Is too narrow at one end so the rb et enge kinda pushes into my leg. I have long thin legs so it's not size that's interfering

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The size, quality, and price were perfect. Significantly decreased my hip pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy pillow for support
reviews.reviewText: This is a handy little pillow that gives me support! I had a broken humerus, and while recovering I needed to keep my body more aligned. I was using a regular pillow between my knees, but that was bulky and hard to turn over. This pillow makes moving around easy while still doing the trick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars That it’s not very firm.
reviews.reviewText: It was very soft the stability. The thickness wasn’t thick enough that she was all right. The sizes too small I did not give me any relief to my back pain and it didn’t stay very cold.

Although the product is suitable for what it claims, it is a bit too small for larger people but should be OK for smaller people. I have had similar products of this shape previously but they have all been a bit larger and therefore are more fit for purpose.
